story_29_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
I’ve got zero doubts that your team is gonna win
this, Master Lear!
story_29_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
We’ll be rooting for you, too, Rachel and Sawyer!
Show those kids who’s boss!
story_29_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: Oh, for suuure. They won’t know what hit ’em!
story_29_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You got us to the semifinals—now it’s our turn to
bring home the victory.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Indeed! Don’t miss our triumphant poses when
we seize the win!
story_29_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: Oh, I’m not even gonna blink! Good luck!
story_29_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Master Lear! This guy says he wants to speak
with you!
story_29_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
What is it, Cheren? Come to spy on the enemy
just before battle?
story_29_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: Nah. I’m not here to spy on anyone.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
And besides, we’re more like battle comrades
than enemies at this point, don’t you think?
story_29_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: Wuh-woh! Did he strike a nerve, Master Lear?
story_29_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
We’ve learned that it’s good to have friends,
haven’t we, young master.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Tsk! Shut it, you two! He’s still on the other
team! You know, the one we’re about to go
battle against!
story_29_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Of course! A battle is a battle. I wish both of
our teams the best of luck.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
But before we get to that, there’s something I’ve
been wanting to talk to you about. The reason
I decided to follow you.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: Huh? I thought Sawyer asked you to do that.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_1900_10:
That was part of it, sure. But there was
something else as well...
story_29_01000/2401_1001_2000_10: You reminded me of myself—of how I used to be.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_2100_10: Did I? And why is that?
story_29_01000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Well, for starters, I used to think that strength
was the only thing that mattered.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
I thought that growing stronger and winning
battles was the only way to prove my worth
to others.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_2400_10: But eventually, I learned that I had it all wrong.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_2500_10:
I owe my success to the friends, Gym Leaders, and
Elite Four members I met along the way—and to a
certain champion who liked to show up uninvited.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_2600_10:
And, of course, to the Pokémon who shared the
journey with me.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_2800_10:
I wouldn’t be who I am today if it weren’t for
the lessons they all taught me.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_2900_10:
So when I see someone treading down a similar
path, I can’t help but want to steer them in the
right direction.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
I guess it’s my way of paying forward the
kindness, you know?
story_29_01000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Hmph. So that’s what all of this has been about...
You steering me on the right path.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_3200_10:
And I’m supposed to feel grateful, am I?
So that you can give yourself a pat on the back
for “saving” me? Hah! I don’t need your pity!
story_29_01000/2401_1001_3400_10:
Whatever his reasons may have been, Cheren
did all of this for you, young master...
story_29_01000/2401_1001_3500_10: Ugh! Stop it! I don’t want to hear another word!
story_29_01000/2401_1001_3600_10: Cheren, I’ve had enough of your meddling!
story_29_01000/2401_1001_3700_10:
I choose my own path! ME! So stay away and
mind your own business!
story_29_01000/2401_1001_3800_10: Come on, you two! We’re leaving!
story_29_01000/2401_1001_4000_10:
This isn’t over, Cheren. I’m going to utterly
annihilate you and [Name:PlayerNickname ] in
the semifinals.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_4100_10: You used me to feel better about yourself...
story_29_01000/2401_1001_4200_10: And now it’s my turn to pay it forward.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_4400_10:
Lear! Did you ever figure it out? What truly
matters to you?
story_29_01000/2401_1001_4600_10:
I merely realized the existence of something
I had all along.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_4700_10:
And I’m going to make you regret having played
any part in that realization!
story_29_01000/2401_1001_4900_10:
*chuckle* You really are a tough nut to crack,
aren’t you, Lear.
story_29_01000/2401_1001_5000_10:
Even so, I’m sure you’re going to be a great
leader someday...and a great king.
